tradeMiningTips: 在NewSwap中进行交易，瓜分牛年新春NEW奖励。
addRemoveLPTips: *添加/移除流动性通证将会为您领取当前奖励。
pageCloseTips: 请于 2月22日12:00(UTC+8) 前领取奖励

unMingCloseTips: 第{{Number}}期已结束，请随时领取奖励。
communityMiningTips: 质押社群矿池对应的流动性通证，获得 NEW 奖励。
communityHeaderSubtitle: 将 {{tokenSymbol}}-NEW 流动性通证质押入矿池，获得 {{earnTokenName}} 奖励。
Apply Creating Community Pool: 点击无门槛申请创建社群矿池
mainstreamMiningTips: 质押主矿区矿池对应的流动性通证，获得 NEW 奖励。

customMiningTips: 参与由牛顿社群成员创建的自定义挖矿，将对应的通证质押入矿池，获得对应的通证奖励。
depositTokens: 质押 {{lpTokenName}} 的流动性通证挖矿 {{earnTokenName}}
depositTips: ⭐️ Every time you stake(0.1% fee) and unstake LP tokens, the contract will automagically harvest NST rewards for you!
depositTipsNewMine: ⭐️ Every time you stake and unstake LP tokens, the contract will automagically harvest NEW rewards for you!
Earn NST tokens by staking NewSwap LP To: Earn NST tokens by staking NewSwap LP Tokens.
stakeLP: Stake NewSwap LP tokens to claim your very own yummy NST!
xNSTTips: You will earn a portion of the swaps fees based on the amount of xNST held relative the weight of the staking. xNST can be minted by staking NST. To redeem NST staked plus swap fees convert xNST back to NST.
xNSPTips: You will earn a portion of the swaps fees based on the amount of xNSP held relative the weight of the staking. xNSP can be minted by staking NSP. To redeem NSP staked plus swap fees convert xNSP back to NSP.
welcomeNSPBar: Welcome to the NSP Bar, stake NSP to earn NSP.
Earn New by staking NewSwap LP Tokens.
nstMiningFee: *每次增加流动性将会收取0.1%的挖矿手续费

nstFarmsTips: 参与主流矿池的挖矿，将对应的流动性通证质押入矿池，获得 NewSwap 的收益代币 NST 奖励
nstBarTips: 将NST质押入锁仓理财合约中，获得权重代币xNST，获得NST分红收益
nstBalance: 当前锁仓理财合约奖励池NST
nspBarTips: 将NSP质押入锁仓理财合约中，获得权重代币xNSP，获得NSP分红收益
nspBalance: 当前锁仓理财合约奖励池NSP
tradeFarmsTips: 所有在 NewSwap 中的交易都将按照交易笔数获得 NEW 的挖矿收益。
